thread.title: China envoy says China will retaliate if U.S. insists on trade war - Xinhua

title: China envoy says China will retaliate if U.S. insists on trade war - Xinhua
text:
April 20, 2018 / 3:34 AM / Updated 7 minutes ago China envoy says China will retaliate if U.S. insists on trade war - Xinhua Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
BEIJING (Reuters) - China will retaliate if the United States insists on initiating a trade war, Chinaâ€™s ambassador to the United States was quoted as saying by the state news agency Xinhua on Friday. A worker checks tailor-made magnetic stainless steel inside a factory in Dongguan, China April 10, 2018. REUTERS/Bobby Yip 
Speaking at an event held by the Fairbank Center for Chinese Studies at Harvard University this week, Cui Tiankai said any dispute should be worked out through dialogue and a trade war would poison the atmosphere of overall China-U.S. relations. 
Cui also urged the United States to abandon a cold war and zero-sum mentality, Xinhua reported. Reporting by Beijing Monitoring Desk; editing Darren Schuettler
